before-build.description: Is run before each build to fill all the project classes with the most recent state of various configurations.

initialize-configuration-service.description: Generate a project specific configuration service and add the correct provider entry to app.module

populate-configuration-service.description: Generate a project specific configuration service that contains the information from nae.json.

create-view.description: If nae.json contains views that were not created yet, creates one of them. Otherwise opens a prompt for the user to input their settings.

create-view-prompt.description: Creates a view based on provided settings. Opens a prompt if no settings are provided.

add-route.description: Adds a new Route object into an existing routes.json file.
